contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} '''Hans-Peter Keller''' (March 11, 1915 – May 11, 1988) was a [[Germany|German]] poet who authored several poem collections, e.g. ''Auch Gold rostet'' (Even Gold Rusts) or ''Panoptikum aus dem Augenwinkel'' (Panopticum seen from the corner of the eye). In the 1960s Hans-Peter Keller was teacher for [[literature]] at the vocational school for librarians in [[DÃ¼sseldorf]]. {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Keller, Hans | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = March 11, 1915 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = May 11, 1988 | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Keller, Hans}} [[Category:1915 births]] [[Category:1988 deaths]] [[Category:People from the Rhine Province]] [[Category:German poets]] {{Germany-poet-stub}}
